website_summaries.verdict: Often recommended by professional stylists, this Pureology shampoo delivers nice results for most consumers.
pros: Contains a sunscreen, organic botanicals and antioxidants
Repeat users rave about how soft and clean this shampoo makes their hair feel
cons: A few customers have mixed opinions on the scent – some say it's fresh and clean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent color retention, even if you shampoo daily
customer_reviews.text: My beautician recommended Pureology Hydrate Sheer Shampoo for my fine, flyaway hair that is prone to split ends. I rate this product 5 stars because it preserves color better than any other shampoo I have used, even with daily use. Expecting the dried-out feeling of my scalp that is typical with commercial shampoos, I initially wondered whether my hair was getting clean with Pureology Sheer. After 7 months of use, this shampoo has redefined my expectations for "clean." My hair feels greasier than usual one day after shampooing, but also looks more natural and healthier because of stable color and decreased frizziness. Glad I can shampoo daily without extra damage.
customer_reviews.author: MargaretNC

customer_reviews.title: retains my hair color nicely, and I get good volume
customer_reviews.text: I agree with others about the strong smell. However, everything else about this is on point. Because it’s low in water content, it’s more concentrated so you can use a lot less than shampoos at the chain pharmacies, which makes this price a lot more reasonable. It leaves my hair feeling healthy, retains my hair color nicely, and I get good volume. I used Pureologie’s pink volume shampoo for years and this is a solid replacement. I’m the type of person that tries other products and switches brands regularly. However, I started using Pureology about 15 years ago because it was sulfate-free. I try other products but continue to be a Pureology customer after all these years. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Filly

customer_reviews.title: Salon Shampoo for Color-treated Hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, salon-quality shampoo! I used to buy it from my beautician at a salon until I started ordering it in the large 1 liter bottle. Pureology shampoo is really concentrated, so it only takes a small amount. I ordered the pumps that fit the bottle and squirt the exact amount needed for shorter hairstyles. It is great for color treated and highlighted hair, like mine, and it has a nice eucalyptus scent.

You defintely get more for your money investing in the large bottles, it's something like 3x's more ounces per dollar than the smaller bottles. I still wish it wasn't so expensive though.

I've not noticed any real benefit in preserving my color. This is quite expensive but it lavers up nicely so a little goes a long way, making it more affordable. I'll probably repurchase.

product_meta.title: Pureology Hydrate Sheer Nourishing Shampoo | For Fine, Dry Color Treated Hair | Sulfate-Free | Silicone-Free | Vegan
product_meta.description:
Size:33.8 Fl Oz

BENEFITS
This sulfate free, silicone-free moisturizing shampoo for fine, dry, color-treated hair has a lightweight formula and doesn't weigh down hair

KEY TECHNOLOGIES
Advanced Hydrating technology to revitalize dry hair, while AntiFade Complex provides the best hair color protection and defends hair against damaging free-radical activity and optimizes hair color retention and vibrancy

AROMATHERAPY
Signature aromatherapy blend of ylang ylang, bergamot and patchouli scents

INGREDIENTS
AQUA / WATER / EAU, SODIUM COCOYL ISETHIONATE, DISODIUM LAURETH SULFOSUCCINATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, SODIUM LAURYL SULFOACETATE, SODIUM LAUROYL SARCOSINATE, GLYCOL DISTEARATE, GLYCERETH-26, DECYL GLUCOSIDE, SODIUM, ISETHIONATE, COCONUT ACID, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, PPG-5-CETETH-20, POLYQUATERNIUM-7, PEG-55 PROPYLENE GLYCOL OLEATE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CARBOMER, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, LINALOOL, BENZOIC ACID, GLYCERIN, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, LIMONENE, GERANIOL, HYDROXYPROPYLTRIMONIUM HYDROLYZED WHEAT PROTEIN, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED, EXTRACT / SUNFLOWER SEED EXTRACT, MAGNESIUM NITRATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, BENZOPHENONE-4, BENZYL ALCOHOL, GLYCINE SOJA OIL / SOYBEAN OIL, TOCOPHEROL, SODIUM ACETATE, EUCALYPTUS GLOBULUS LEAF EXTRACT, ETHYLCHLOROISOTHIAZOLINONE, PHENOXYETHANOL, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE, MELANIN, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, CITRIC ACID

How to use:

Apply a quarter-sized amount to wet hair and lather. Rinse. Repeat if necessary. For sensitive scalps, rinse after 30 seconds. For best results, follow with Hydrate Sheer Condition.



BRAND STORY
Pureology offers a collection of haircare & styling products that enhance & protect color vibrancy. From concentrated Zero Sulfate Shampoos to our conditioners & stylers, each product is designed to maximize color retention.
